summary: Crocheting app with tutorials, project publishing, progress tracking, materials list, and free access (no payment required). Focus on aesthetic design.
architectural_notes: No payment system or monetization features required - completely free app
SEO optimization with meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and structured data for search engine and social media discoverability
known_issues: Admin navigation link not appearing in the Navigation component after user logs in with Internet Identity

existing_features.title: Create a tutorials section that displays crochet patterns and techniques with step-by-step instructions
Implement functionality for users to publish their completed crochet projects with photos and descriptions
Build an active tracking system that allows users to monitor progress on their current crochet items, including completion percentage and time spent
Create a materials list feature that displays the supplies needed for each tutorial or project, including yarn type, hook size, and additional materials
Ensure all app features are accessible without payment or subscription requirements

Design a visually cohesive and aesthetic user interface with a warm, craft-inspired visual theme featuring earthy tones, soft textures, and elegant typography that evokes the handmade nature of crochet
Render generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for hero sections, tutorial illustrations, and decorative elements
Add meta tags to frontend/index.html including title, description, and keywords optimized for crochet tutorials, project sharing, and crafting community
Implement Open Graph meta tags in frontend/index.html for rich social media previews on Facebook and LinkedIn, including og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url, and og:type
Add Twitter Card meta tags in frontend/index.html including twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, and twitter:image for enhanced Twitter previews
Add JSON-LD structured data markup to frontend/index.html defining the app as a WebApplication with schema.org vocabulary, including name, description, applicationCategory, and offers properties
Update semantic HTML elements across key pages (HomePage, TutorialsPage, ProjectsGalleryPage) to use proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3) and ARIA landmarks for improved accessibility and SEO
Add a canonical link tag in frontend/index.html to prevent duplicate content issues when the app is accessible via multiple URLs
Ensure the TutorialsPage displays the newly added sample tutorials in the grid view, showing each tutorial's title, step count, and material count in TutorialCard components.
Verify that TutorialDetailPage correctly displays all details for each sample tutorial including the full materials list table and numbered step-by-step instructions.
Create an AdminPage component at frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx that displays a list of all tutorials with options to add, edit, or delete each tutorial

Implement a TutorialForm component that allows creating and editing tutorials with fields for title, description, difficulty level, steps (array of text inputs), and materials (using MaterialsInput component)
Create React Query mutations in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts for createTutorial, updateTutorial, and deleteTutorial that invalidate the tutorials query cache on success
Add an 'Admin' navigation link in the Navigation component that is visible only to authenticated users and routes to the AdminPage
Configure the /admin route in frontend/src/App.tsx to render the AdminPage component
Implement delete confirmation dialog in AdminPage that prompts user to confirm before deleting a tutorial
Debug and fix the Admin navigation link in the Navigation component to ensure it displays correctly for authenticated users after logging in with Internet Identity
Verify that the isAdmin check in the Navigation component correctly calls the useIsAdmin query hook and only displays the Admin link when the user has admin privileges
Ensure the Navigation component re-renders when authentication state changes by properly subscribing to identity context updates from InternetIdentityProvider
Add console.log statements in the Navigation component to debug the isAdmin state, identity state, and re-render behavior when authentication changes
Ensure the useIsCallerAdmin query in Navigation component is enabled and runs immediately after authentication state changes from anonymous to authenticated
Add explicit dependency on identity state in the Navigation component to force re-render when authentication status changes from logged out to logged in

Update the Navigation component at frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx to add useEffect hooks that explicitly watch for changes in the identity state from useInternetIdentity and trigger the useIsCallerAdmin query to refetch when authentication status changes from logged out to logged in

Ensure the useIsCallerAdmin query in the Navigation component is properly enabled and configured to run immediately when the identity state becomes authenticated, using the enabled option based on identity presence

Add refetch mechanism in Navigation component that manually triggers the useIsCallerAdmin query refetch when the actor instance changes or identity updates, ensuring the admin status check runs with the newly authenticated identity

new_feature_requests.summary: Tutorials section for crochet patterns and techniques
Ability to publish completed crochet projects
Active progress tracking for crochet items in progress
Materials list feature showing needed supplies for each project
Aesthetic UI design throughout the app
Add SEO enhancements including meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter Cards, and structured data markup
Add sample tutorials with beginner-friendly crochet patterns (granny square, chain stitch, single crochet) including step-by-step instructions, materials lists, and difficulty levels

Add 5 beginner-friendly sample crochet tutorials to the backend with complete data including title, description, difficulty level, step-by-step instructions, and materials lists. Include tutorials for: granny square, chain stitch, single crochet, double crochet, and magic ring.
Build an admin panel to add/edit/delete tutorials through the UI without coding
Add backend methods to main.mo for creating, updating, and deleting tutorials including createTutorial, updateTutorial, and deleteTutorial with appropriate access control
Verify that the backend isCallerAdmin method in main.mo correctly returns true for the authenticated principal and that the method is being called with the correct identity
